about_the_game:
About the Game

Sit back, relax and follow the meditation to the Zero Point Focus in your mind. This is a VR version of the vision board used for creating what you want to manifest in your life. Place items on the quantum grid and allow the voice to help you navigate the mental and emotional requirements for creation.

Features:

A journey into the creative point in the mind
Choice menu of wealth, health, relationships and more…
A quantum grid that enables you to interact with your chosen items
A soothing experience that allows relaxation for the body and mind

content_descriptors.notes: This product contains the genitalia of characters.

name: Quantum Vision Board

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows
  • Processor: I5 10500 or Equivalent or Better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1050 TI or Equivalent or Better
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
